definition: pen/pencil/writing brush/to write or compose/the strokes of Chinese characters/classifier for sums of money, deals/CL:支[zhi1],枝[zhi1]
to support/frame/rack/framework/classifier for planes, large vehicles, radios etc

sentences.english: I could imagine that my old penholder feels reproachfully towards me.
sentences.chinese: 可以想象，那根老旧的笔架肯定在责怪我。

sentences.english: The China from Bijia Mountain had joined the Maritime Silk Road.
sentences.chinese: 笔架山窑的瓷器，已经加入到海上丝绸之路的行列。

sentences.english: The Bijia mountain ecological landscape area construction, the deadline of planning is five years.
sentences.chinese: 笔架山红枣生态景观区建设，规划年限五年。

sentences.english: We can't wait to get to the Bijia Mountain.
sentences.chinese: 我们已经迫不及待地要到达笔架山了。

sentences.english: I'll tell you that the mountain is like a camel, like a penholder.
sentences.chinese: 我来告诉你，这座山就像一只骆驼，它又像一个笔架。

sentences.english: The pen rack for drawing is in convenient for enhancing drawing quality and speed.
sentences.chinese: 此笔架有利于提高绘图质量和速度。

sentences.english: Bijia Mountain ecological tourism area lies in Bijia Mountain, Banling Village, Zi Mountain Township.
sentences.chinese: 笔架山生态旅游区位于紫山镇半岭村笔架山。

sentences.english: Bijia Mountain ecological tourism area lies in Bijia Mountain, Banling Village, Zi Mountain Township.
sentences.chinese: 笔架山生态旅游区位于紫山镇半岭村笔架山。

sentences.english: The common drawing tools are all placed on the same pen rack, which is convenient for the drawing work.
sentences.chinese: 常用的绘图工具都放在同一笔架上，方便了制图工作。

sentences.english: The pen rack for drawing is a drawing special pen rack used by engineering and technology personnel.
sentences.chinese: 是工程技术人员使用的绘图专用笔架。

sentences.english: The utility model discloses a pen rack for drawing, belonging to a stationery class.
sentences.chinese: 绘图笔架这一实用新型属于文具类。

definition: Four Treasures of the Study, namely 筆|笔[bi3], 墨[mo4], 紙|纸[zhi3] and 硯|砚[yan4]/the essentials of calligraphy and scholarship (idiom)
water pot or goblet (for Chinese calligraphy)
small cup for adding water to an ink stone
case for an ink stone or ink slab
high-quality ink stonemade in Duanxi and Guangdong
seal case/box for seal and ink pad
